  • Eight days training on “Advanced Hyperspectral Remote Sensing for Mineral Exploration”, under GIAN program from NIT, Raipur.

  • Three-day workshop on “Microwave Remote Sensing”, under India Trento Program for Advancement in Research (ITPAR) in IIT Bombay.
